prompt: What is the policy for returning items?
completion: The policy for returning items allows customers to return products within 30 days with a receipt.

prompt: Are discounts available for bulk purchases?
completion: Yes, discounts are available for orders over $500.

prompt: What are the terms for international shipping?
completion: International shipping is available with additional charges, and delivery times vary by country.

prompt: How are warranty claims handled?
completion: Warranty claims are managed through customer support. Products with valid warranties can be repaired or replaced.

prompt: What payment methods do you accept?
completion: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and online payment options like PayPal.

prompt: Is there a restocking fee if I return something?
completion: No, we do not charge a restocking fee for returns.

prompt: Can I track my order status after it ships?
completion: Yes, you will receive a tracking link via email once your order has shipped.

prompt: Can I exchange an item I purchased?
completion: Yes, items can be exchanged if they are returned within 30 days with a valid receipt.

prompt: Is gift wrapping available for purchases?
completion: Yes, gift wrapping is available at an additional cost during checkout.

prompt: How can I cancel my order?
completion: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placement by contacting customer service.

prompt: What is the return policy for electronics?
completion: Electronics can be returned within 15 days with a receipt. Some exclusions apply.

prompt: Do you offer free shipping?
completion: Free shipping is available on orders over $100.

prompt: What is the warranty period on furniture?
completion: Furniture comes with a 1-year warranty that covers defects in material and workmanship.

prompt: Can I purchase a gift card?
completion: Yes, gift cards are available in various denominations and can be purchased online.

prompt: Are there any discounts for members?
completion: Members receive a 10% discount on all purchases, excluding clearance items.

prompt: What is the estimated delivery time?
completion: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days, while expedited shipping can deliver in 1-2 business days.

prompt: Do you accept returns without a receipt?
completion: Returns without a receipt are accepted at the manager's discretion, and store credit may be issued.

prompt: How do I redeem a coupon code?
completion: Coupon codes can be entered during checkout in the discount code section.

prompt: What should I do if my item is damaged?
completion: If your item is damaged, please contact customer service immediately for a return or replacement.

prompt: Can I change my delivery address?
completion: Delivery addresses can be updated before the order ships by contacting customer service.

prompt: Is there a minimum order for free shipping?
completion: Free shipping is available on orders over $100.

prompt: Can I use multiple promo codes?
completion: Only one promo code can be used per order.

prompt: How do I sign up for your newsletter?
completion: You can sign up for our newsletter on the website by entering your email address at the bottom of the page.

prompt: What happens if my order is out of stock?
completion: If an item is out of stock, we will notify you and offer the option to either backorder or cancel the order.

prompt: Can I purchase online and pick up in-store?
completion: Yes, we offer in-store pickup for online orders. Select the 'In-Store Pickup' option at checkout.

prompt: What is your privacy policy?
completion: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. It can be viewed on our website.

prompt: Are there any seasonal sales?
completion: Yes, we have seasonal sales during holidays like Christmas, Black Friday, and New Year.
